snippet.title: RAGE 2 – Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
The world of RAGE 2 comes to life with our new announce trailer!

The official gameplay reveal for RAGE 2 will release right here tomorrow, May 15. Stay tuned for more information about the return of the wild world of RAGE.

For more information on RAGE 2, follow these channels: 

Website - https://beth.games/rage
Facebook – https://facebook.com/rage
Twitter – https://twitter.com/ragegame 
Instagram – https://instagram.com/rage 

ESRB RATING PENDING: May contain content inappropriate for children. Visit www.esrb.org for rating information.
